attributes.action: David Cameron; Scrap foreign aid and spend the money on British flood defenses.
attributes.additional_details:
- A large proportion of the aid goes to nations with a space agency
(Source, Mail Online, 9th August 2013)

- A proportion of the cash is given to the top 20 most corrupt nations.
(Source, Mail Online, 28th December 2015)

- UK Government debt is currently at £1.6 Trillion (£1,600 BILLION).
(Source ONS, March 2015)
attributes.background:
Foreign aid spending is currently at £12 Billion per year and will rise to £16 Billion per year by 2020.

As a comparison, this is half of the UK government housing budget for  2015 (£25bn).

This will increase national debt by at least £125bn by the next election.
